article_title: ObamaCare Risk 'Manageable' As More Sign Up And Pay, Aetna CEO Says

article_metadata.description: Despite the troubled rollout of the Affordable Care Act, Aetna’s chairman said financial risks from the health law are manageable in 2014, adding that more Americans are signing up and paying their premiums. The comments this morning during the company’s fourth-quarter earnings call by Aetna chairman and chief executive Mark Bertolini [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
